channel.title: Outdoors on Blog | Stephanie Wilkinson
channel.description: Recent content in Outdoors on Blog | Stephanie Wilkinson

item.title: The Biggest Instrument in the World
item.description: The World Harp We just got back from a concert featuring an instrument called the World Harp. A group of artists and technicians travel around the world and have concerts featuring this harp. Playing the harp Building the harp Tonight, they had constructed it from the base on the ground, to the bridge at the top of a skyscraper. The harp strings were literally strung to the top of the building.

item.title: Trip to Iceland
item.description: I’m writing this from the BART in San Francisco. Tomorrow, I attend a brief workshop on Institutional Research in Independent Schools. I always find SF to be so energizing–it’s like, even landing in SFO feels exciting to me. For some reason, it seems like this is a city full of people like me. Seeing billboards in the airport for companies I’ve worked with, or interned for, or whose products I use makes me feel oddly at home.
